Pydio 6.0.2 - Micro bugfix

Previous release fixed XML problems by xml-encoding some messages, which breaks the HTML display of the install wizard. This is a very small bug but was ruining the very first user experience.

Upgrade instructions

IMPORTANT: if you have not yet upgraded to v6.0.0, please read the Pydio 6 release note and upgrade instructions before going further.

Nothing special to do for 6.0.1 to 6.0.2
